abstract: A long-standing dispute between Kerala and Tamil Nadu could be easily resolved, the author argues.
lead_paragraph: Futurologists say that the next world war will be fought over water because fresh supplies will become increasingly scarce. Pakistan has already added water to the long list of disputes with India and people in India have grown concerned about what they say are Chinese efforts to dam the Brahmaputra River.

headline.main: A War of Words Over Water
